00028 class cGate;
00029 class cMessage;

00031 
00037 class SIM_API cChannel : public cComponent //implies noncopyable
00038 {
00039   protected:
00040     cGate *srcgatep; // gate the channel is attached to
00041     int connId;      // for cChannel::getProperties(); usually the NED connection element's id
00042 
00043   public:
00044     // internal: called from cGate
00045     void setSourceGate(cGate *g) {srcgatep=g;}
00046 
00047     // internal: sets connId
00048     void setConnectionId(int id) {connId = id;}
00049 
00050     // internal: called from callInitialize(). Does one stage for this
00051     // channel, and returns true if there's more stages to do
00052     virtual bool initializeChannel(int stage);
00053 
00054     // internal: overridden to perform additional checks
00055     virtual void finalizeParameters();
00056 
00057   public:
00063     explicit cChannel(const char *name=NULL);
00064 
00068     virtual ~cChannel();
00070 
00077     virtual std::string info() const;
00078 
00083     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00084 
00088     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00089 
00093     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00095 
00106     virtual void callInitialize();
00107 
00112     virtual bool callInitialize(int stage);
00113 
00117     virtual void callFinish();
00119 
00129     virtual cModule *getParentModule() const;
00130 
00134     cChannelType *getChannelType() const  {return (cChannelType *)getComponentType();}
00135 
00140     virtual cProperties *getProperties() const;
00141 
00145     cGate *getSourceGate() const  {return srcgatep;}
00146 
00153     virtual bool isTransmissionChannel() const = 0;
00155 
00164     virtual bool deliver(cMessage *msg, simtime_t at) = 0;
00165 
00173     virtual simtime_t calculateDuration(cMessage *msg) const = 0;
00174 
00183     virtual simtime_t getTransmissionFinishTime() const = 0;
00184 
00192     virtual bool isBusy() const;
00194 };
00195

00203 class SIM_API cIdealChannel : public cChannel //implies noncopyable
00204 {
00205   public:
00213     explicit cIdealChannel(const char *name=NULL) : cChannel(name) {}
00214 
00218     virtual ~cIdealChannel() {}
00219 
00224     static cIdealChannel *create(const char *name);
00226 
00233     virtual bool deliver(cMessage *msg, simtime_t at);
00234 
00238     virtual bool isTransmissionChannel() const {return false;}
00239 
00243     virtual simtime_t calculateDuration(cMessage *msg) const {return 0;}
00244 
00248     virtual simtime_t getTransmissionFinishTime() const {return 0;}
00249 
00253     virtual bool isBusy() const {return false;}
00255 };
